Most useful RStudio keyboard shortcuts (the ones we use hundreds of times a week). 

Mastering these, and being aware of the many less-common shortcuts, will make your work in RStudio more efficient.

#### RUNNING CODE

 * Ctrl + Enter - Run current line or selection in Editor pane

 * Ctrl + Shift + Enter - Source the current document (or selected chunk when in .Rmd)


#### MANIPULATING THE R ENVIRONMENT

 * Ctrl + L - _Clear console or terminal_

 * Ctrl + Shift + H - _Change working directory..._

 * Ctrl + Shift + F10 - _Restart R session_


 * Ctrl + 1 - _Move focus to Source Editor_

 * Ctrl + 2 - _Move focus to Console_

 * Ctrl + 3 - _Move focus to Help_

#### EDITING CODE

 * Home - _Move cursor to beginning of line_

 * End - _Move cursor to end of line_

#### AUTOMATIC CODE COMPLETION

 * Tab / Ctrl + Space - _Attempt completion_

 * Enter, Tab, or Right - _Accept selected candidate_

 * Esc - _Dismiss completion popup_

***

And there are _many, many, many_ more! 

See:

 * Alt + Shift + K - _Show Keyboard Shortcut Reference_
